K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-1: sarba ma n'anta mi ta siddhi tsee tya n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-3: shes pa thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-8: rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-9: phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-10: phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-12: spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal; ;rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-13: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lngas grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-15: gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-16: tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309a-17: rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyings kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-0: byams pa la sogs pas @309b bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-5: thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig bkye ste; stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-6: 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-7: dig pa rnams smra shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-11: nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-12: dmyal ba rnams tshe phri nas rim gyis sdug bsngal las thar pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:309b-13: gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten gyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-0: de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor @310a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-1: rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la bla re dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-14: rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-15: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-17: mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di ni; rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-18: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-23: de mtshams med pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-25: sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-26: bi ma la aushn'i sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o; ;aom tre dhva sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-27: dzva la dharma dha tu garbha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-28: sam ha ra na aa yu:sam sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310a-29: p'a pam sarba ta th'a ga t'a sa manta aushn'i sha bi ma la bi shuddhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-0: rig pa chen @310b mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-1: rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-3: shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-4: lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-5: bkur sti bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-6: rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam mgul du thogs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-9: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-13: sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-14: ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-15: aom tre dhe sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-16: dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-17: sam ha ra na a'a yu:sam sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-18: p'a pam sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta aushn'i sha bi ma la bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-19: ma h'a bi ra dze ra gam bhi ra si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-21: bi bi sa ra aa aa lam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-23: sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-26: rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-27: chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-28: aom stree ya dhe sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:310b-29: dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-0: sam ha ra na a'a yu sam sho dha @311a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-1: ya; p'a pam sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta bi ma le aushn'i sha bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-2: ma h'a bi ra dze ra gam bhi ra si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-3: dharma dh'a tu bi bi sa ra aa ma ma ki sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-5: chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-6: gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-7: nam mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-8: aom stree ya dhe sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-9: dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-10: sam ha ra na a'a yu:sam sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-11: b'a bam sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-12: bi ma le aushn'i sha bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-13: ma h'a ma bi ra dze ra gam bh'i ra si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-14: dharma dh'a tu bi bi sa ra aa aa aae kham ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-16: nam mkha'i khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-19: mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-20: bi ma la aushni sha'i gzungs bzlas te 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-22: sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-27: 'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311a-28: rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-0: aom ratna tsee tye panytsa ye bi bi sa @311b ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-1: zhes brjod nas ba'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-2: thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-3: rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-4: gang zhig gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-8: de ni; 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyi rlabs ma bzhugs pa'i phyir rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-9: 'byung ba chen po gang la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-10: rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te rdo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-11: shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-12: de gdon mi za bar bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-13: rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-15: bee d'urya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:311b-16: de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-0: gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i @312a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-2: mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-3: rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-4: bye ba btab kyang gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-7: rig pa chen mo de'i sngags 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-14: aa dhishtha na aa dhi shthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-18: 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mchod rten gcig btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-20: brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-21: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-22: stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-23: khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so; ;'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-25: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-26: de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-27: thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312a-28: mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-0: mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i @312b gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas de sa bdag byin gyis brlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-1: dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-2: thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-3: aom badzra s'u tra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-4: ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon ji tsam rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-5: 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam rnam pa thig gis sa bcad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-6: de bzhin du sa bcad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-7: sa gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-8: de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng gi phur ba sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-9: aom badzra k'i li k'i li k'i la ya sarba dushtam h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-10: ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te rdo rje phur bus dmigs te dbus dang gra bzhir gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-12: mi dang mi ma yin pa las srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-13: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-15: seng ldeng gi phur bu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-16: mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-17: de nas til dang yungs kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:312b-18: aom aa mri te ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-0: ces lan bdun bzlas te sa'i phyogs su gtor @313a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-1: bas; sa phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-2: de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-3: bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-5: gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-7: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di bklags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-8: sa phyogs de yang shin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-9: de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-10: aom badzra kha na kha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-11: ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-13: de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma zhig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-14: tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste brdung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-15: badzra mud ga ra a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313a-16: ces lan bdun bzlas te rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-0: nyon mongs pa dang bag @313b chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-1: de nas 'jim pa bdzi ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-2: spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgyas gtugs te sbos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi yi ge aa zhe bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang chas par dmigs te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-3: aom aa mri te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-4: ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-5: de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-6: de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-7: aom badzra pra marda n'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-9: 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-10: de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-11: 'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya bcings te rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-17: ya sho ya sho ba ti te dzo shuddhe bi shudehe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-19: aa dhishtha na aa dheshthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:313b-20: aa na mo te hi ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-0: zhe bdag nyid kyi rig pa chen mo 'di lan @314a */
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-1: bdun gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di sbyin gyis brlabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-2: 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam lnga phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-3: phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-4: 'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-5: de ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-6: de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-7: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-8: zhes lan bdun bzlas te byi gyis brlabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-9: 'bi 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas bar 'phros shing khyab ste 'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-10: 'od zer gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-11: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-12: de nas 'bi b'i'i nang bi ma la aushn'i sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314a-16: shing shun la sngags bris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-0: @314b de'i nang du rig sngags so so'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-2: de rnams phrugs su sbyar te mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-4: gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na; de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-5: nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-10: de nas tsee tya'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-11: til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-12: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-13: zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-14: de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-15: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-16: de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-17: aom badzra mud ga ra a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-18: ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-19: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:314b-20: de nas bi ma la aushn'i sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-0: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las mchod kyi @315a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-1: sku'i mchod rten 'byams klas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-2: de nas mchod rten phur bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-3: aom dharma dh'a tu ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-5: zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten byung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-6: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa 'brel ba las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byams klas pa 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-7: 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor bam stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-8: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-9: de nas mchod rten snod nas phyung ba las 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-10: aom bra ma na ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-11: zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-14: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-15: rin po che'i shar bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-16: dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-17: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-18: de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315a-19: aom dharma dha tu sv'ah'a bha ba bi shuddhe dharma te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-0: zhes lan mang du @315b bzlas te btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-1: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-2: de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-3: dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-4: de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-6: gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsigs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-9: shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te 'og gi khri yang seng+ge'i khri'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-11: padma'i khri stegs su byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-12: de'i steng du go ma yam dang sbos chus chag chag btab ste dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun tu gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-13: tsandan gyi chus zlum por bskus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-14: srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-15: dkyil 'khor bri bar yang mchod rten lngar btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-17: de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-18: stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:315b-19: mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad padma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-0: de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig @316a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-1: pa chen po'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-2: aom su pra tishtha stu be sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-3: zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-4: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-5: de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-10: de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-11: dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-12: aom badzra padma sa ma ye sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-13: zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-14: padma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-15: sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i khams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-16: rgya mtsho'i mjing thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-17: gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-19: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-20: mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-24: srung ba ljang gur dmigs te na bza' yang de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316a-25: de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-0: @316b dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge ram dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-2: zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes kyi me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-3: de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-6: gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge aa dkar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-7: aom aa tsandra mandal h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-8: ces grangs ji tsam rnam par bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-9: mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-10: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:316b-11: de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-0: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byams klas par 'phros shing sems can gyi khams thams @317a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-1: cad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-2: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-3: de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas kyang bskyed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-4: mchod rten dkyil 'khor du gzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-5: aom badzra dh'a tu aa dhi tishtha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-6: zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na rin po che'i sa gzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-7: chos kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-8: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-9: de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste bzhag nas de mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-11: spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-20: mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams pa rnam par dag par rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317a-21: aom sarba p'u dza pushpe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-0: zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam @317b par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-1: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-2: mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po che re res mchod cing yon du dar bu chung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-3: 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-4: gdugs dbu chung yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-6: de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-7: dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-8: mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-11: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du dgos te dmigs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-12: ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la aushni sh'i gzungs kyi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:317b-13: rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re ba kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du gdang zhing 'tsher ba zhig tu dmigs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-0: de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer na tshogs 'bams klas par rigs la phyogs bcu 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab te 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus nas de nyid kyi dbu'i @318a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-3: 'phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-5: thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la; dung phor gyi nang du spos chab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-6: dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i aargas gsol to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-7: aarga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung por bzhag la spos chu'i nang du aa dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te mchod pa dbul pa'i rig pa chen po 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-8: aom aa mri te aargham pra t'itstsha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-9: zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-10: 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-11: tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-12: de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318a-13: de nas bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di bklag cing lan ci mang du brjod par byas nas bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-0: cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi bden rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las dgongs @318b pa ma nyams par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-2: mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs te mchod rten btab na yang cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-4: de bzhin du ma gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-5: yang bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-7: yi ger 'bri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-8: cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyid 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-9: mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-10: bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-11: mchod pa phul zhing mnga' gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-12: gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-13: rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-14: sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-15: dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-16: mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-17: brlabs kyang rdzogs par yongs mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-19: gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-20: sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-23: bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-24: gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:318b-25: gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-1: yis; ;mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-2: ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-3: tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-4: tshe rabs gzhan du skyes nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-5: rigs mchog dam par skyes nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-6: longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por bskyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-8: tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-9: dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-10: dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-041:319a-11: bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyod //
